Class MaxSumOperator

java.lang.Object
  operation.MaxSumOperator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Operator
public class MaxSumOperator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Operator

This class implements all the necessary methods to perform a correct execution of MaxSum

Author:
Michele Roncalli < roncallim at gmail dot com >

computeQ

public MessageQ computeQ(NodeVariable sender,
                         NodeFunction receiver,
                         double alpha,
                         java.util.LinkedList<MessageR> rmessages)
It compute the q-message, given the normalization factor alpha and the list of r-messages

Parameters:
alpha - the normalization factor
rmessages - list of rmessages (aggregated in the computation)
Returns:
the q-message, or a null value if the list of rmessages is empty

Returns:

computeZIndex

public int computeZIndex(MessageContent z)
Given Z, it gives back the argmax

Parameters:
z - array of summarized r-messages
Returns:
the (lower) index of array with the maximum/minimum value, corresponding to the argmax/argmin
